name: Kung Fur Club
description:
In this offline game you will fight for the title of champion playing as a cat. Game Features: 

★ New design of classic game rock-paper-sсissors

★ A lot of of interesting opponents: fight zombies, ninjas, mummy - and if you're lucky - beat the chicken. 

★ Easy and interesting game mode 


This game is part of the Totem network of games. Use your unique Totem Avatars in the game for exclusive features.

Don't have an Avatar yet? Get one for free through the Totem Explorer website!
